attributes.action: Give ALL public school children free school dinners
attributes.additional_details: Did you know if the petition gets 10,000 signatures it will get a mention in government but if we can get 100,000 signatures it will be debated in parliament so please, get all friends and family to sign as the are so so many people country wide that would benefit from their children having school dinners
attributes.background:
Our daughter and many other children miss out on free school dinners because we and their parents/guardians miss the cut off point by a few pence! Why should prisoners get free dinners but our children don't.... it's completely wrong.
PRIMARY AND SECONDARY COUNCIL SCHOOLS SHOULD OFFER FREE DINNERS
